claim: The heaviest superhero has a dark brown eye colour.
extra_info: the heaviest superhero refers to MAX(weight_kg); eye colour refers to colour where eye_colour_id = colour.id;
reasoning: The heaviest superhero is Godzilla (weight_kg = 90,000,000), whose eye colour is 'No Colour', not 'dark brown' as the claim states.

content.thinking: Let me explore the database schema and then verify the claim.

input.description: Get schema for superhero and colour tables

content.content:
CREATE TABLE superhero
(
    id             INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    superhero_name TEXT default NULL,
    full_name      TEXT default NULL,
    gender_id      INTEGER          default NULL,
    eye_colour_id  INTEGER          default NULL,
    hair_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    skin_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    race_id        INTEGER          default NULL,
    publisher_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    alignment_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    height_cm      INTEGER          default NULL,
    weight_kg      INTEGER          default NULL,
    foreign key (alignment_id) references alignment(id),
    foreign key (eye_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (gender_id) references gender(id),
    foreign key (hair_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (publisher_id) references publisher(id),
    foreign key (race_id) references race(id),
    foreign key (skin_colour_id) references colour(id)
);
CREATE TABLE colour
(
    id     INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    colour TEXT default NULL
);

CREATE TABLE superhero
(
    id             INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    superhero_name TEXT default NULL,
    full_name      TEXT default NULL,
    gender_id      INTEGER          default NULL,
    eye_colour_id  INTEGER          default NULL,
    hair_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    skin_colour_id INTEGER          default NULL,
    race_id        INTEGER          default NULL,
    publisher_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    alignment_id   INTEGER          default NULL,
    height_cm      INTEGER          default NULL,
    weight_kg      INTEGER          default NULL,
    foreign key (alignment_id) references alignment(id),
    foreign key (eye_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (gender_id) references gender(id),
    foreign key (hair_colour_id) references colour(id),
    foreign key (publisher_id) references publisher(id),
    foreign key (race_id) references race(id),
    foreign key (skin_colour_id) references colour(id)
);
CREATE TABLE colour
(
    id     INTEGER not null
            primary key,
    colour TEXT default NULL
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claude-code-claimdb/test_dbs/superhero.sqlite" "SELECT s.superhero_name, s.weight_kg, c.colour FROM superhero s JOIN colour c ON s.eye_colour_id = c.id WHERE s.weight_kg = (SELECT MAX(weight_kg) FROM superhero);"
input.description: Find heaviest superhero and their eye colour

content.text:
The heaviest superhero is **Godzilla** with a weight of 90,000,000 kg, and their eye colour is **"No Colour"**, not "dark brown."
